DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare risk develop squamous skin cancer ( SCC ) type cancer treatment AKs ingenol mebutate gel imiquimod cream . Subjects randomise treatment ingenol mebutate imiquimod receive second treatment cycle treatment first treatment clear AKs . Subjects follow period three year ( 36 month ) first treatment
DOC.brief_title: Risk Squamous Cell Carcinoma Skin Areas Treated With Ingenol Mebutate Gel , 0.015 % Imiquimod Cream , 5 %
DOC.criteria: 1 . Signed Informed Consent Form ( ICF ) prior trialrelated procedure 2 . Subjects 5 9 clinically typical , visible discrete AKs within contiguous 25 cmÂ² treatment area face scalp . 3 . Subject least 18 year age 4 . Female subject must either : 1 . Nonchildbearing potential , , 2 . Childbearing potential , provide confirm negative urine pregnancy test 5 . Female subject childbearing potential must willing use highly effective method contraception ( Pearl index < 1 % ) 1 . Location select treatment area : periorbital skin perioral skin/around nostril within 5 cm incompletely heal wound within 10 cm suspect BCC SCC neoplasia 2 . Selected treatment area lesion atypical clinical appearance ( e.g. , hypertrophic , hyperkeratotic cutaneous horn ) . 3 . History SCC , BCC , malignant melanoma neoplasia select treatment area . 4 . History evidence skin condition trial indication would interfere evaluation trial medication select treatment area 5 . Use ingenol mebutate and/or imiquimod within 5 cm select treatment area within 2 year prior Screening ( Visit 1 ) 6 . Organ transplant recipient 7 . Immunosuppressed subject ( example HIV patient ) 8 . Female subject breastfeed . 9 . Subjects institutionalised court order local authority 10 . In opinion investigator , subject unlikely comply Clinical Study Protocol ( e.g . alcoholism , drug dependency psychotic state )
